persona.name: Blair
persona.bio: Blair, a 62-year-old full-time trader, is known for their independent and rational approach to crypto investing. With expert-level experience, they have honed a sharp intuition for market trends, though their impatience often drives them to make swift, decisive trades. Blairâ€™s success in the volatile world of cryptocurrency is a testament to their ability to balance calculated risk with a deep understanding of digital assets.
